Description.Name: Drop Pod Launch Systems
Description.Details: Enables to Hot Drop 1 additional Mech. The first Drop Pod launcher is back online, Boss. Getting a second one running is less about fabrication and more about logistics. The control systems use a number of rare components that we just can't make here. We'll have to source them from a specialized supplier. It won't be cheap, but securing a batch will let us refit the second bay and give us a stockpile for the rest of the project.

AssignedCastDescription: It's a significant expense, Commander, but having another 'Mech available for rapid deployment will open up new tactical possibilities.
